packs.title: TOUR & EXHIBITION
detailsOne: Two-way Bus Transfer to the ranches during all 6 days of the tour.
Meals: Welcome Cocktail, 6 breakfasts, 6 lunches, 4 dinners (dinners on April 19th and April 21th not included)
detailsTwo: Transfers in the morning from the Hotel to the Sociedad Rural de Corrientes (Corrientes Exhibition Fairgrounds) and back to the Hotel in the afternoon/evening - during 4 days.
Meals: 4 breakfasts, 4 lunches at the Sociedad Rural de Corrientes, and Closing Dinner

packs.title: Tour
detailsOne: Two-way Bus Transfer to the ranches during all 6 days of the tour.
Meals: Welcome Cocktail, 6 breakfasts, 6 lunches, 4 dinners (dinners on April 19th and April 21th not included)

packs.title: Exhibition
detailsTwo: Transfers in the morning from the Hotel to the Sociedad Rural de Corrientes (Corrientes Exhibition Fairgrounds) and back to the Hotel in the afternoon/evening - during 4 days.
Meals: 4 breakfasts, 4 lunches at the Sociedad Rural de Corrientes, and Closing Dinner

globalNote: *Rates expressed in US Dollars, per person based on double room. *Feel free to ask on rates for single or triple rooms.*In case you don´t need the transfer in the tour, please discount U$D80. * In case you don´t need the transfers between the Hotel and the Sociedad Rural de Corrientes, please discount U$D20.
